hero.title: Build Your Dream Website With Us
hero.description: We create stunning, modern, and responsive websites that help your business stand out online. From concept to launch, we're with you every step of the way.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.heading: What We
services.description: Comprehensive web development services designed to bring your digital vision to life

customWeb.title: Custom Web Development
customWeb.description: Tailored websites built with the latest technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js to meet your unique business needs.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Mobile-first designs that look perfect on any device, from smartphones to desktop computers.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Full-featured online stores with secure payment integration, inventory management, and user-friendly shopping experiences.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Search engine optimization to help your website rank higher and attract more organic traffic.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Lightning-fast loading times and optimal performance to keep your visitors engaged.

security.title: Security & Maintenance
security.description: Regular updates, security patches, and ongoing support to keep your website safe and running smoothly.

portfolio.title: OUR WORK
portfolio.heading: Recent
portfolio.description: Take a look at some of our recent projects that showcase our expertise and creativity

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform

corporate.title: Corporate Website
corporate.description: Professional corporate website with CMS integration and SEO optimization.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Platform
realEstate.description: Property listing platform with advanced search and filtering capabilities.

booking.title: Booking System
booking.description: Online appointment booking system with calendar integration and notifications.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Dashboard
socialMedia.description: Analytics dashboard for managing multiple social media accounts.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Website
restaurant.description: Beautiful restaurant website with online menu and reservation system.
